name: Easy Social
author: Alex Thorpe

sections.description:
Ever get tired of having a different plugin for each social media site or having one with so many options you never get it configured? The Easy Social Media Plugin was designed with you in mind. After you activate the plugin just enter your information into a few fields, place the easy social widget where you want it to appear and your done.

After each post you will have buttons so your visitors can share your content on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+, Pintrest & Stumbleupon while the widget gives you links back to all your social media sites.
sections.installation:
1. Upload easy-social-media folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings => Easy Social Settings and input your social media information
  4. Place the Easy Social widget in the desired widget area
  5. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Who is this plugin for

Anyone that wants to include social media in the blog without all the configuration required of more complex

Why don’t you include (insert obscure social media site)

This plug in is designed to be simple and hit 90% of what people actually use, if you would like a social media plugin that includes everything there are plenty of great ones available.
